sequence:
A Date With Atago

<size=45>Chapter 6: An Evening Present</size>

scripts.say: Even though some unexpected things happened, your big sister is still pretty happy~
Commander, what did you think of our date? Did you have fun?

options.content: Yes, it was a lot of fun

scripts.say: *giggles* Thank you. By the way, isn't the ocean beautiful tonight?
Sometimes, I lose sight of what I'm fighting for. But when I come here and look out over the ocean, I'm reminded once again.
After all... I'm fighting for what I want the most.
... at least, I'm now convinced of that fact.
I believe that as long as we live, we should never lose sight of our goals.
Once you've decided on a goal, you have to see it through, no matter what. Even if that path might lead you to destruction, you have to keep pushing forward.
The day you turn around is the day that you lose all momentum to keep moving forward. Even though I might not look the part, I'm actually a very persistent person.
You're right, sometimes I find myself forgetting about my purpose as well.
Connecting the hearts of everyone who has made their way here to this port, bridging the gaps between many different cultures and beliefs...
After tonight, you'll be going back to your usual routine.
And I might not be your secretary anymore tomorrow. You'll have a chance to make bonds with someone else.
That's why I'd like a present... the thing that I want most.
